_sText:
The map has:
• 64 spawns
• 5 levels + ZM round(6 level)
• 6 items for humans
Item 1: Heal staff
Item 2: Tornado staff
Item 3: Quicksand staff
Item 4: Earth staff
Item 5: Fire staff
Item 6: SandStorm(Ultimate) staff(2, 3, 4, 5, 6 level)

• 3 items for zombies
Item 1: Antlion(3, 4, 5 level)
Item 2: Fire
Item 3: Dark

• 4 bosses

Fixed a bug where the player is stuck on spawn.

29.10.2017: Gameplay is not changed
Fixed a bug, where 1 zombie could infect the whole team of humans at level 5.
Found a bug yesterday, although the map was made a long time ago, but I believe that bugs need to be fixed.
12.10.2020: Small boost to bosses. Visual changes.
